body:
<!--StartFragment-->

OKIE is a young and talented Gospel artist, very promising and ready to expand the Kingdom of heaven through his Music. 

Born on the 27/05/1995. In the South West Region of Cameroon as an only Child to Mr and Mrs Okie, the young man has always been promising.

 Grew up as a Christian child and started off as a pianist in the Full Gospel Mission looking up to Rochie Osvalin And Emma Gospel  as seniors in the Music field. 

"Nelvie Keys" as he was called then. Has been an outstanding pianist in the church for years until he derailed from the faith when he traveled to Abu Dhabi in the United Arab Emirates in 2017. 

At the time, he released a couple of secular songs and a videos. However, God later convicted him and asked him to use his talent for His glory. Amazingly, that is what he has been doing ever since. 

Apparently, this led to his return to the country and his subsequent decision to only use his talent for the Glory of God. 

Currently under the mentorship of Rochie Osvalin and the Management of Worship Nation with the likes of other Label Mates such as Wache.G, A.D.S,             C Agbor.

Okie is a very promising Cameroonian who believes our Gospel Artists have the potentials to affect lives worldwide he has a heart for God.

<!--EndFragment-->
summary: OKIE is a young and talented Gospel artist, very promising and ready to expand the Kingdom of heaven through his Music. Born on the 27/05/1995. In the South West Region of Cameroon as an only Child to Mr and Mrs Okie
